headline: Paperback Row
abstract: Six new paperbacks to check out this week.
lead_paragraph: THE SOURCE OF SELF-REGARD: Selected Essays, Speeches, and Meditations, by Toni Morrison. (Vintage, $16.95.) These 43 shorter pieces by the Nobel laureate include a stirring tribute to the 9/11 victims, a eulogy for James Baldwin, an address given to Amnesty International and glimpses of the thinking behind some of her early novels. “Morrison, quietly and without ceremony, lays another gem at our feet,” James McBride wrote in these pages.
